metadata.title: CVE-2024-1947 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A denial of service (DoS) condition was discovered in GitLab CE/EEaffecting all versions from 13.2.4 before 16.10.6, 16.11 before 16.11.3,and 17.0 before 17.0.1. By leveraging this vulnerability an attacker couldcreate a DoS condition by sending crafted API calls.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
